sect2.title: Dépendances d'installation de Coreutils
sect2.para: Encore non vérifié mais cela doit ressembler à ceci:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, chown, echo, expr, hostname, install, ls, mv, rm, sleep, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Gettext: msgfmt, xgettext Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Glibc: getconf Grep: egrep, fgrep, grep Make: make Gawk: gawk Perl: perl Sed: sed Tar: tar Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo
